name: ripcityticketdispatch
description: Sports affiliate event tracking platform with AI-powered odds

scripts.install:all: cd affiliate-backend && npm install && cd ../affiliate-frontend && npm install
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.lint: cd affiliate-backend && npm run lint && cd ../affiliate-frontend && npm run lint
scripts.lint:fix: cd affiliate-backend && npm run lint:fix && cd ../affiliate-frontend && npm run lint:fix

author: Mazzlabs
